Package battle

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • battle.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the player class it represents various fields of the player. It includes all the details of the player like name, abilities, health, striking power, and avoidance ability.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player​(java.lang.String name, ValueGenerator randomNumber)
      It constructs the player object.

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              ValueGenerator randomNumber)
       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        It constructs the player object. It initializes the field of the player.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the value of the ability is less than 6 or greater than 18;
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

                            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • getSortedListOfGears

        public Gear[] getSortedListOfGears()
        This method specifies the sorted order of the gear quip by the player. The gears are sort by the prespecified order given to then using double dispatch in compareTo.
        Returns:
        the Sorted array of gear.
